CommandManual.description: List information about the FILEs (the current directory by default). Sort entries alphabetically if none of -cftuvSUX nor --sort is specified.
CommandManual.example_output: commands.txt cp1.txt file.txt mans.py manuals manuals.py __pycache__ temp tester.py verification.py
CommandManual.related_commands: lspcmcia, lsmod, lslocks, lsattr, lshw, lsinitramfs, lsns, lsusb, lslogins, lsmem, lsb_release, lspci, lsmod, lscpu, lspgpot, lsof, lsblk, lsipc, lspcmcia, lsmod, lslocks, lsattr, lshw, lsinitramfs, lsns, lsusb, lslogins, lsmem, lsb_release, lspci, lsmod, lscpu, lspgpot, lsof, lsblk, lsipc
